space.gui.application

Class KeyBinding

  • java.lang.Object
    • space.gui.application.KeyBinding

  • public class KeyBinding
extends java.lang.Object
    The model of the mapping between keys and actions. It is an implementation of a two-way map as it looks up action to key, and key to actions.
    Author:
    Matt Graham 300211545
